message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds immense value, potentially worth significantly more than $1000000.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product right now, I'm confident it could be a game-changer for the right individual. I'm willing to let you acquire it for $1200000. This is a substantial offer, considering I have another buyer ready to purchase it for $1000000.  I believe in this product's potential and think it could be even more valuable in your hands.  Let me know your thoughts.
